txt.en:
Rook is looking increasingly agitated. It appears that he has finally realized that his avanc has met its end.

'You... you did this! But no matter, we can make a trade!

'I will take that beautiful war-steed of yours, and you can have this avanc!'

'It is dead, you say? Well, that is rather beside the point, is it not?

'I must travel east to finally gain all of the knowledge I need to become a Wizard!

'And you... you will not stand in my way!'
Rook is furious that he is stranded on the fields of Rohan with no means to travel East. He believes your war-steed would be a proper replacement for his avanc.
'You should have taken my trade, fool!'
Rook is atop his avanc to the west of Snowbourn in the Sutcrofts.
Rook may have left some of his trappings on his avanc.
